text:
ThousandEyes | Software Engineer | San Francisco, London | VISA, INTERNS, ONSITE

We are a Network Intelligence startup that values small, cross-functional teams where everyone has an equal say.

Looking for talented Software Engineers (Backend, Frontend, or Fullstack) to make a direct impact in our product.

Our web application tech stack is:

AngularJS, Redux, d3.js, Java, Spring, MongoDB

We also have data collection and distributed systems positions that include C++

https://www.thousandeyes.com/careers

If you want to apply as a team? Email us at omihailov at thousandeyes dot com
